text: 15.16: Ro 1.5; 11.13; 12.3; Ga 2.7-9; Fi 2.17Ana na farasarigim, gu Krais Zisasan ŋaara guma kav, gu zav harigi fhaiŋ ŋgui gumgi rɨgar zɨgap, anan ŋaara mbui. Gu ana ŋaara mbuav, Fhe Bakɨme buna vhuueŋ bun nzuai, gu anan rotu gari guman fara muuŋgiap ki. Gu mba harigi fhaiŋ ŋgui gumgi ndiv Fhe Bakɨme han zɨrga. Mba tɨv, ana Fhe Bakɨme nzuav ofar muunga. Fhe Bakɨme, ana guigira mba ofa vuzvugirga. Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar, ana mben muuŋgirim, mbe guigira Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigi guari kɨrga.
